footer_copy: Council on the language policy of RS(Y)
a_title: Council language policy at the Head of the Republic of Sakha (Yakutia)
a_text: Language Policy Council at the Head of the Republic of Sakha (Yakutia) is an advisory body to the Head of the Republic of Sakha (Yakutia) for the implementation of the language policy of the Republic of Sakha (Yakutia), and was created to ensure cooperation of public authorities with civil society institutions in the implementation of the language policy.
q_text: Council language policy is an advisory body to the Head of the Republic of Sakha (Yakutia) for the implementation of the language policy of the Republic of Sakha (Yakutia), and was created to ensure cooperation of public authorities with civil society institutions in the implementation of the language policy.
q_status: Head of the Republic of Sakha (Yakutia)
p_text: Determines priorities of language policy of the Republic of Sakha (Yakutia) in the field of conservation, study, development and use of the state and official languages of the Republic of Sakha (Yakutia)
p_1_text: The contest is aimed at stimulating entrepreneurial activity among entrepreneurs

e_text: Determines priorities of language policy of the Republic of Sakha (Yakutia) in the field of conservation, study, development and use of the state and official languages of the Republic of Sakha (Yakutia)
n_text: In order to further sustainable and harmonious development of ethno-cultural and linguistic diversity, support of the state and official languages in areas inhabited by indigenous peoples of the North of Sakha Republic (Yakutia).
